original_title: ผีน้องเมีย
overview: Lamphu is staying with her sister, Ramphai and her boyfriend, Sith. Sith has an affair with Lamphu and when he finds out that she already has a boyfriend he kills her in a rage.He dumps her body in the river and tells Ramphai that her sister stole something and then left.
title: Phi Nong Mia
